isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - ENGINE FRONT COVER AND/OR GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: ENGINE FRONT COVER AND/OR GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE
wtsproc.config: This guideline is for R & R of front section only. It is not necessary to open the Air Conditioning or Power Steering system if equipped. It is not necessary to remove the oil pan when servicing the front section only.

step1.para: Chock wheels
Remove front bumper assembly
Open hood
Disconnect battery to ground cable, include ECM ground wire
Remove hood assembly, includes disconnect hood wiring harness, hood stop cables and pivot bolts
Drain cooling system
Remove right engine splash shield
Remove charge air cooler hoses, include cap open ports
Disconnect water heater hose from mount bracket at radiator and secure out of way for access
Disonnect condenser assembly from radiatior assembly and secure out of way. Includes disconnect pressure transducer, removing P-clips securing lines and remove right recirculation seal if applicable
Disconnect fan hub air hose if applicable
Disconnect surge tank hoses and coolant level sensor connector
Disconnect ground strap from lower left side of radiator
Disconnect lower radiator Hose from thermostat housing
Disconnect lower right radiator hose from front cover
Disconnect lower radiator stay rods
Remove stone shield lower screws
Remove upper frame cross member with grill attached
Remove lower frame cross member section, include remove tow hooks
Install lifting device, remove radiator assembly mounting bolts and remove assembly
Remove fan blade, drive, pulley and hub components, includes belt and tensioner
Remove engine position / timing sensor (CAM), includes disconnect wiring
Remove alternator mounting bracket with alternator attached, includes disconnect wiring and remove support bracket
Remove crankshaft damper using puller
Remove oil pump assembly, include remove drift key
Remove water pump drive pulley and water pump assembly
Remove front engine bracket to cross member bolts
Position bottle jack to raise block and remove engine bracket

note.para: Position jack to allow rotation of crankshaft

step1.para: Remove air compressor bolts if applicable
Remove front cover assembly bolts and front section of front cover
Align timing gears and mark camshaft gear in relation to upper idler gear
Check timing gears back lash and camshaft end play
Clean parts and block mating surfaces
Install front cover assembly front section
Install front engine bracket to front of engine
Lower complete engine using bottle jack
Install front engine bracket bolts to cross member
Install air compressor if appliciable and torque to spec.

note.para: Tighten tailshaft support bracket at block first and then at rear of compressor

step1.para: Heat crankshaft damper using heating iron
Install water pump assembly and drive pulley, includes torque bolts to spec.
Replace front seal and install oil pump assembly, include install drift key. Torque bolts to spec.
Install crankshaft damper, includes replace wear ring and torque bolts to spec.
Install fan hub, pulley, drive and blade components, includes belt and tensioner. Torque to spec.
Install fan hub line fitting if applicable
Install radiator hose clamp (shrink type) on lower right hose before installing radiator
Install radiator assembly using lifting device, install mounting bolts and remove lifting device

note.para: Position lower right hose onto front cover while installing

step1.para: Connect lower radiator stay rods
Connect ground cable (strap) at radiator
Connect radiator hose to thermostat housing and shrink clamp using heat gun
Position and shrink lower right radiator hose clamp at front cover
ConnectsSurge tank hoses and low coolant level sensor connector, include install plactic ties
Connect fan hub air hose if applicable
Connect condenser to radiator assembly, includes connect pressure transducer connector, securing lines and installing right recirculation seal if applicable
Install lower and upper frame cross members, include install tow hooks
Install radiator stone guard grill screws to lower frame cross member
Install charge air cooler hoses
Install alternator mounting bracket with alternator attached, includes connect wiring and install support bracket
Install engine position / timing sensor (CAM), include replace o-ring and connect wiring
Install belt tensioner, torque to spec.
Connect heater hose to mount bracket at radiator
Fill cooling system
Install hood assembly, includes connect stop cables, harness connectors and install pivot bolts
Connect battery to ground cable, include ECM ground wire
Install front bumper assembly
Check/test engine operation and for leaks
Top off fluids as needed
Close hood and remove wheel chocks
